body_html:
even updating to r1.1 and updating the compiler to gcc6.2 brings no joy...the problems shown above go away..but there seems to be some wierd issue with code generation and illegal usage of an instruction

bazel build --copt="-mavx512f" --copt="-mavx512dq" --copt="-mavx512vl" --copt="-Ofast" -s -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
ERROR: /home/levinth/tensorflow_1_1/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:1337:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/core/kernels:dynamic_stitch_op' failed: gcc failed: error executing command /usr/bin/gcc -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fstack-protector -Wall -B/usr/bin -B/usr/bin -Wunused-but-set-parameter -Wno-free-nonheap-object -fno-omit-frame-pointer -g0 -O2 '-D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=1' -DNDEBUG ... (remaining 111 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
/tmp/ccT8Q8Xu.s: Assembler messages:
/tmp/ccT8Q8Xu.s:23313: Error: invalid register operand for `vmovdqu'
body_text:
even updating to r1.1 and updating the compiler to gcc6.2 brings no joy...the problems shown above go away..but there seems to be some wierd issue with code generation and illegal usage of an instruction
bazel build  --copt="-mavx512f" --copt="-mavx512dq" --copt="-mavx512vl" --copt="-Ofast" -s -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
ERROR: /home/levinth/tensorflow_1_1/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:1337:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/core/kernels:dynamic_stitch_op' failed: gcc failed: error executing command /usr/bin/gcc -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fstack-protector -Wall -B/usr/bin -B/usr/bin -Wunused-but-set-parameter -Wno-free-nonheap-object -fno-omit-frame-pointer -g0 -O2 '-D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=1' -DNDEBUG ... (remaining 111 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
/tmp/ccT8Q8Xu.s: Assembler messages:
/tmp/ccT8Q8Xu.s:23313: Error: invalid register operand for `vmovdqu'
body:
even updating to r1.1 and updating the compiler to gcc6.2 brings no joy...the problems shown above go away..but there seems to be some wierd issue with code generation and illegal usage of an instruction

bazel build  --copt="-mavx512f" --copt="-mavx512dq" --copt="-mavx512vl" --copt="-Ofast" -s -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
ERROR: /home/levinth/tensorflow_1_1/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD:1337:1: C++ compilation of rule '//tensorflow/core/kernels:dynamic_stitch_op' failed: gcc failed: error executing command /usr/bin/gcc -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fstack-protector -Wall -B/usr/bin -B/usr/bin -Wunused-but-set-parameter -Wno-free-nonheap-object -fno-omit-frame-pointer -g0 -O2 '-D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=1' -DNDEBUG ... (remaining 111 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
/tmp/ccT8Q8Xu.s: Assembler messages:
/tmp/ccT8Q8Xu.s:23313: Error: invalid register operand for `vmovdqu'
